sequence:
My Fond Memories

<size=45>Chapter 5: Cute Little Piggy</size>

scripts.say: When I woke up, I was in the bed in the office.
What a troublesome little piggy... Didn't I tell you to rest properly?
Since you're already having me nurse you back like this, if you don't follow my every order, you're going to be punished~
Hmm... How should I tease you once your cold gets better... I'm getting excited just thinking about it~
My head feels dull and sluggish... It seems like I've caught the cold.
But you know, I can't just neglect the work that has been piling up just because you're out with the cold, so...
Tonight, I'm going to stay up all night - I shall take care of work while also taking care of you. lit~tle~ pig~gy~♪
Why are you a little piggy, you ask? Why are you only asking this now?
To me, anyone that's worth teasing is a little piggy, you know? ... Well, that said, little pet piggies are special to me.
After replacing the soaked towel on my forehead, Ajax brought a bowl of chicken noodle soup and a spoon over.
I went through the trouble of making some chicken noodle soup. Eat it while it's still hot, got it?
Okay, open your mouth. Say ahhhn~.
Wait, it's still too hot... Phew~
Good piggy~ ...Earlier, I said that pets are different, right? Despite the way I am, I still love pets.
But, the ones I'm raising are... hehe, to be exact, there's only one. So...
